NEW_UPDATE_AVAILABLE: Il y a une nouvelle version de Cuevana disponible. Faites la mise à jour maintnant et profitez des dernières fonctionnalités.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Recherche par titre, acteur, réalisateur, genre...
TITLE: Titre
NO_HISTORY: Pas d'élement trouvé dans votre historiques
NO_HISTORY_MSG: Choose an option from the left menu to list content available for watching.
PENDING_REQUESTS: There are pending requests with the server. Sure you want to exit?
PLEASE_WAIT_PLAY: Please wait, loading torrent to start playing
TORRENT_NOT_LOADED: Sorry, the torrent file couldn't be loaded.
HISTORY_DELETE_ALERT: Your entire history will be deleted. Are you sure?
NO_CONNECTION: The server is unreachable. Make sure you are connected to the internet.
ERROR_OCURRED: Something went wrong, but we were unable to identify the error. If the trouble persists, contact us.
